WorkItem.Description: I'm unable to import characters into rawr, both from the addon and from battle.net.  Rawr loads up fine.  When I try to import from the beginning popup window or after I close it the program freezes and becomes unresponsive until I am required to open task manage and shut it down.  I've tried to run Rawr as administrator, and with multiple characters.

Comments.Message:
Same problem here, but the issue ONLY appears on my DK - Staghelm/US/Narcissistic
Druid-ok
Shaman-ok
Mage-ok
Paladin-ok
DK - Rawr locks at 100% CPU every time (works fine on 4.2.1). Computer stays stable so at least its isolated.

I can track it down even further:

The only character i can not load (with the same issues, with the version at EJ as well as with the downloadable one) is my DK, more precisely my TankDK (loads just fine when in Frost Off-spec). To be even more precise: It does not load from any source, not from Battle.net and not from saved files. When creating a new character from scratch to try out where the problem is, I found that it is probably caused by the "Bone Shield" Talent. I could assign every talent from the top and when I reached and clicked on "Bone Shield" Rawr froze again with 100% CPU usage.

Hi all, been using rawr since it's first baby steps, LOVE IT. 
BUT, alas ..i'm also stuck on 100% CPU load, that even after i kill the Rawr window, stays on untill the process for the Rawr.exec s also killed.
was not able to track it down any better...
this is the best i could do.

Tested Random Toons on my server, they all load ...except DK tank, 
DK DPS loads without freeze
I'll take a look.  I've been using my tank w/o issue locally on my dev builds but I noticed a delay last night when I didn't see this last week.
Thx @Shazear, just happened after the last update version last night, i loaded my tank from the Rawr addon, then got the message for the new version, and restarted Rawr, and it all went south...
Its not just Dk tank, its everything, I've tried every one of my toons, Mage, Warrior dps, DK tank / dps, Enh Shaman, Lock, Rogue, Priest.  It just freezes right after I start the import.
hmm did you also try some random toons fron your server?
We have some reporting it w/ just TankDK, and some with other toons... please provide links to NON-TankDKs that have this problem.

I only see the problem on my TankDK. I have tried mage, hunter, shaman, paladin, my DK specced as frost wearing frost gear,  my DK specced as frost wearing tank gear, and my tank DK naked. The only hangups I have relate to the tank DK spec and do not appear to be related to gear.

all the DK DD that I tried , from my server, all loaded, tried a few other classes as well with no problem, and normal CPU levels.

My DK Tank is Deadblue, Zuluhed, German server. armory link :
 
http://eu.battle.net/wow/en/character/zuluhed/Deadblue/simple

(LOL i had no idea there were so many Deadblues now O.o guess i godda stop posting videos of my solos on youtube)

Thanks guys.  I checked in a fix that will get deployed for the next release.  Hopefully that resolves at least the TankDK issue.
Once 4.2.3 is released I'll track down any other import issues.
thx @Shazear, you the best. :) do you know when it's going to be available for download? hehe i so hate my exel reforge "thing" it tries to eat my mind.

It seems to be a problem with Bone Shield.
Manually importing works fine until spend talent point in Bone Shield.
Then just hangs.

Hope that helps.

Rawr just update itself, tried both manualy and from battle net , and...IT WORKS :)  
Great job thx.

PS.- had a few guildies try some random DK tanks on their machines (diff. set up etc..) and it went smooth all the way.
